channel.title: Jquery on Aleks Gorbenko
channel.description: Recent content in Jquery on Aleks Gorbenko

item.title: Firehose Project Week 11
item.description: Finally, the jQuery actually makes more sense now. I have spent this week reading up on it and finished a couple of courses as well. One on Pluralsight and another one here (update: it is offline now, so try this instead). The latter is very practical as it basically asks you to do something with jQuery and gives you 300 seconds to figure out how to do it. Each task makes you google, come back and try your solution, repeat if not working.
